name: Ooze
description: A gelatinous, amorphous creature, representing adaptability, persistence, and slow but inevitable progress.

person: Someone who adapts to any situation and persists despite obstacles
A person who slowly corrupts or consumes everything around them
creatureTrap: Creatures that are difficult to harm with conventional weapons
Slow-acting hazards that gradually become more dangerous over time
place: Locations that slowly change or adapt to circumstances
Areas that are slowly being consumed or corrupted by some force
treasure: Items that improve or adapt based on how they are used
Treasures that slowly degrade or corrupt over time
situation: Gradual progress that eventually leads to significant change
Slow-building problems that become serious if not addressed
